Author: Clavin Fernandes
Summary: How to resize AzureVM and getting around the Error - Storage account of type “Premium_LRS” is not support for VM size “Standard” during VM resize. For more details see: https://clavinfernandes.wordpress.com/2017/07/27/failed-to-resize-vm/
Title: Resize AzureRm Virtual Machine
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Windows Azure Virtual Machines
